description: Allows the player to throw their weapon which will travel for the specified amount of time and damage all the entities it hits on the way.

damageFactor.description: Specifies the factor that is applied to the weapon's normal damage.

speed.description: Specifies the speed of the weapon when thrown in blocks per tick (1 second = 20 ticks).

duration.description: Specifies the duration in ticks (1 second = 20 ticks).
